name: ECHO (itch) (Suitangi)
description:
ECHO is a simple bullet-hell inspired game where your only enemy is yourself— from the past.  How you play on your side is exactly how you'll play when you're on the enemies side. So be careful with that gun: the more you shoot now, the more bullets you face in the future.

How to Play:

Use the arrow keys to move and the 'Z' key to shoot. These keys can be remapped in the Options menu (although there is a bug of function keys not showing up in the display, don't worry, they still work fine).
